item.title: Basic git tutorial
item.description: Hello I’m Murali! If you’re reading this you are confused about the process of git and want to have full clarity. Don’t worry, by the enf of this post. you will have good idea on git and its basics. What is git? Git is a distributed version-control system for tracking changes in source code during software development. It is designed for coordinating work among programmers, but it can be used to track changes in any set of files
